body_html:
FWIW I'm getting the same error, and doesn't seem to be intermittent. I can repeatedly clone https://github.com/google/boringssl.git but always get the error:

Error cloning repository: https://github.com/google/boringssl.git: 400 Bad Request caused by https://github.com/google/boringssl.git: 400 Bad Request and referenced by '//tensorflow/core/distributed_runtime/rpc:grpc_server_lib'.

when running
bazel build -c opt --config=cuda //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package

body:
FWIW I'm getting the same error, and doesn't seem to be intermittent. I can repeatedly clone https://github.com/google/boringssl.git but always get the error:

```
Error cloning repository: https://github.com/google/boringssl.git: 400 Bad Request caused by https://github.com/google/boringssl.git: 400 Bad Request and referenced by '//tensorflow/core/distributed_runtime/rpc:grpc_server_lib'.
```

when running
`bazel build -c opt --config=cuda //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package`
